content: Bang on! In today’s time of over cautious investments, down rounds are a given if earlier valuation was too high. As they say — “Too much money makes you numb & dumb” you loose the agility as well as creativity for putting the right product to solve a problem. Taking in smaller funding keeps you on your toes and drives you to chase the revenue. The 12–18 month runway (for any size of funding) is a gospel truth. Very apt article for startups in today’s world.
